com.linecorp.armeria.common

Interface HttpRequestWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HttpRequest, org.reactivestreams.Publisher<HttpObject>, Request, StreamMessage<HttpObject>, StreamWriter<HttpObject>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpRequest

    public interface HttpRequestWriter
extends HttpRequest, StreamWriter<HttpObject>
    An HttpRequest that can have HttpObjects written to it. Use HttpRequest.streaming(HttpHeaders) to construct.
